title: A Man At Twilight
description: Archie MacLean , a mixed race private investigator, is surprised by a sister he did not know he had. She brings him news that they are the new owners of a resort on Barbados, thanks to an inheritance from their Scottish father. But when Archie ,his Amerasian wife, his Native American partner and his wife, and his Scottish sister, visit the resort they find the manager is involved in a scheme to rob them of their inheritance. This sets in motion events that have them and their friends fighting to save, not only their property, but their lives.
author: Vibert Miller
